name: The Reunion
description:
The Reunion

Ploralis "Bruce" Malope is  a simple moth meeting up with some of his old high school friends for an evening of nostalgia and merriment.  

NOTE: This game is really cheesy and kind of weird?? Idk, I'm very  tired. You have been warned.

A short, dialogue-heavy game made for the Twitsy Bot Jam using the Twitter bot @mothgenerator to create the basis for the characters. Happy Birthday Emma!! 💕

Thanks to Adam for  bitsy, ayolland for the borksy tool, and mildmojo and Ducky for les hacks.

Song is "Warm & Fuzzy" made with beepbox.
